snippet: WEISS--Marcella, formerly of Bay Shore, NY, on June 25, 2016 at Sunrise of Basking Ridge, NJ. Beloved mother of David Weiss and Abby ONeill, grandmother of five, great-grandmother of three. An angel forever in our hearts. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: WEISS--Marcella, formerly of Bay Shore, NY, on June 25, 2016 at Sunrise of Basking Ridge, NJ. Beloved mother of David Weiss and Abby ONeill, grandmother of five, great-grandmother of three. An angel forever in our hearts. 1/3
